mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cart(user_seq, product_seq, product_count) VALUES(#{userSeq}, #{productSeq}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_seq, c.product_count, p.product_seq, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_imgurl FROM tb_cart c JOIN tb_product p ON c.product_seq = p.product_seq WHERE c.user_seq = #{userSeq}
